scripts.install:docs: cd ./workspaces/docs && rm -rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.install:calendar-widgets-tests: cd ./workspaces/calendar-widgets-tests && rm -rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.install:calendar-widgets: cd ./workspaces/calendar-widgets && rm -rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.new: npm run install:calendar-widgets-tests && npm run install:calendar-widgets && npm run install:docs
